title.rendered: Presentation of Posthumous Civil Merit Award to the late Nigerian Ambassador to Spain, Amb. Ademola Razak Seriki.

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama hosted the Minister of Foreign Affairs, European Union and Cooperation of the Kingdom of Spain, H.E. Jose Manuel Albares on 12th January, 2023.
Discussions centred on strengthening bilateral relations, while the visiting Spanish Foreign Minister presented his country’s Posthumous Civil Merit Award to the late Nigerian Ambassador to Spain, Amb. Ademola Razak Seriki.
The award was received on behalf of the family by the wife of the late Ambassador, Mrs. Wosilat Seriki and his son, Wale Seriki.
